archimate:BusinessObject.name: ValueStandard
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: ValueStandard is the abstract base class for defining a set of standardized PolicyValues. This set of PolicyValues will be added to over time, and represents a set of common values that are useful in a variety of PBNM applications. The subclasses of ValueStandard are a set of classes that define the semantics of commonly occurring variables that occur in PBNM applications.
